column3:
Zukin is a picture of panic.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Rescue the hot-headed Kojin on the Isle of Zekki.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, we have a situation! A band of Red have made off with merchandise due to be delivered to Kokajiya...and that isn't the worst of it.
Seeking to reclaim the stolen articles, one of our hot-headed brothers struck out for the Isle of Zekki, but he is slow to return. I fear for his life. Please, find him and bring him back safely!
You will pay for your trespass!
Y-You are of the Divine Circle? My thanks!
Were it not for your timely intervention, our merchandise would have been lost, never mind my life. But come, let us quit this place ere more Red appear.

<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, pleased am I to see you hale and whole. Our hot-headed brother, too, returned a short while ago, none the worse for his ill-conceived foray, and with the merchandise intact.
While it is enough that none of us came to harm, I am grateful that we will be able to fulfill our trade obligations. You have my humblest thanks.
